title: Witte Wieven - Dutch Mythology
content: Hallo en welkom op het kanaal, mijn naam is Anna-Maria en ik zal je in de aflevering van vandaag door een aantal mythen, legendes en folklore leiden. Ik zal het over Witte Wieven hebben . Als je deze aflevering leuk vindt, like dan een reactie en abonneer je. Dit helpt het kanaal een handje kavel. Allereerst sorry voor de uitspraken. Ik zal mijn best doen. Witte Wieven komt uit de Nederlandse mythologie en komt ook voor in legendes. Ze zijn een vorm van elfen of wijze vrouwen. De oudste verhalen over hen komen uit de 7e eeuw. Ze zijn verbonden met blanke dames . dat zijn bovennatuurlijke wezens en geesten en Witte Wieven kan ook staan ​​voor blanke vrouwen ze zijn in de vroege middeleeuwen op verschillende manieren beschreven ze werden meer gezien als grappenmakers en later werden ze meer gezien als mist of spookheksen die soms slecht waren geleerden geloven dat ze in de legende kwamen toen mensen wijze vrouwen begonnen te eren die waren gestorven en dat de graven heilig waren op een hoger niveau. Volgens sommige verhalen waren Witte Wieven bedreven in kruidengeneeskunde en genezing en gebruikten ze dit om mensen zowel mentaal als fysiek te helpen. Ook konden ze in de toekomst kijken en vanwege deze kwaliteiten hadden ze een hoge status in de samenleving in de mythologie waren de geesten op aarde en soms hadden ze ook elfenkwaliteiten. Ze konden mensen helpen, vooral degenen die om hulp vroegen en hun offers brachten, maar ze konden ook mensen hinderen als ze dat wilden. Ze konden op begraafplaatsen worden gevonden als heilige plaatsen en als je ergens een mist ziet van deze plaatsen zou Witte Wieven kunnen zijn. En dat was alles voor deze aflevering. Ik hoop dat je het leuk vond en ik zie je in de volgende aflevering.

title: Learn Dutch with Motivational Stories – Improve Your Dutch Listening Skills
content: Hello everyone, Welcome to our channel where learning Dutch becomes an exciting adventure. Today, you don't just watch a video. You step into a new reality. Listen carefully. This moment could change your life forever. I'm here to tell you something that no one else will tell you. Something that can ignite a fire in your soul. May I ask you something? Are you happy with your life right now? If you died tomorrow, would you be proud of what you have achieved so far? If the answer is no, then this is your wake up call. Let me tell you something. Your life doesn't change overnight. It doesn't get better by luck. The life you desire will only become a reality if you decide to change it. Stop living between excuses. You've been making them up for far too long. I'm too young, I'm too old. I have no money. I don't have enough time. They are lies. Excuses are lies you tell yourself to avoid responsibility. Do you know why most people fail not because of bad luck, not because of a lack of intelligence. They fail because they do nothing. They sit still and complain about their problems instead of solving them. Do you think successful people had it easy? I'll give you a clear example. Oprah Winfrey was born into poverty and went through difficult things. People said she would never make it, but she didn't listen to others. She worked hard and stayed focused. Today, she is one of the most influential people in the world. What's holding you back? Nothing, except your own way of thinking. Imagine what your life could look like. Close your eyes for a moment and imagine this. You wake up in a beautiful house. The house of your dreams. Outside, there is a luxury car in your driveway. Your parents smile, knowing that they don't have to worry about anything anymore. You took care of them. You gave them the life they deserve. The life they dreamed of for you. That life they envisioned while working hard every day. Open your eyes again. Does it sound impossible? It is not. This life is absolutely possible. But it takes one thing: your dedication to change. Your habits shape your future. I want to be honest with you. Your habits build you up. Or break you down. There is no middle ground. If you spend hours watching Netflix, sitting on Instagram, or playing video games, you're throwing away your future. Time is the most valuable thing you have. Every second you waste, you don't get back. What distinguishes successful people from others? They use their time wisely. They read books, learn new things and work on their dreams. They don't waste their time. Think of your parents. Your mother carried you for nine months. She gave up her dreams, her health and her rest. Just to give you life. Your father worked day and night to give you food, education, and opportunities. Now it's your turn. What do you do to give them back what they have done for you? Don't want to see them happy? Don't you want to give them the life they always dreamed of? Imagine your mother's face when you give her the key to her dream house? Imagine the tears in your father's eyes when you tell him that he will never have to work again because you made it. It's not just about money. It's about giving them peace, joy, and pride. Proud to be able to say my child made it. Success requires sacrifices. I'm going to tell you something you might not want to hear. Success is not easy. It means getting up early, even if you want to stay in bed. Work on your goals while your friends go out. Saying no to distractions. There is a story about a young man who wanted to be successful. He went to a wise man and asked: How do I achieve success? The sage took him to the sea. They walked into the water together. The sage pushed his head underwater. The boy struggled. He had to breathe. When he came up, gasping for breath, the sage said. If you want success, as your breath needed, then you will achieve it. Ask yourself: how badly do you really want it? Surround yourself with winners. Look at your friends. Lift them you on Or are they pulling you down? If your friends are negative, lazy, or unmotivated, you know what's happening. Then you will become just like them. Success isn't just about hard work. It's also about the environment you choose. Surround yourself with people who inspire, challenge, and make you better. If that means ending friendships that are harming you, do it. Your future is more important than their opinion. Believe in yourself. This is the most important thing I can tell you today. You have to believe in yourself. No one else is going to do that for you. The world is full of critics. They will say you are not good enough, you are not smart enough, you can't do it. Proves the opposite. Believe in your potential. Believe that you can achieve anything. And what about failure? Failure is not the end. It is the beginning. Every successful person has failed more often than you think. Michael Jordan was rejected for the school team. He gave up. No, he trained harder, worked more and became a legend. Failure is a lesson. It is a step on the way. Accept it, learn from it and move on. Take time for yourself. The world is loud. Social media, appointments, responsibilities, everything requires your attention. But when was the last time you really thought about yourself? What is really important to you? Take a few minutes every day just for yourself. Meditate, think, or breathe deeply. It is not a waste of time. It is essential for your mind. If you don't take yourself seriously, who will? And yes, talk to yourself. Say things like I'm strong, I'm valuable, I can achieve great things. Train your mind. Your brain is like a garden. What your plant grows. If you sow doubt, fear and negativity, that's what you get. Plant courage, hope, and confidence and you will flourish. Say it out loud: I'm the best. Nothing can stop me. I can achieve what I want. Write it down and repeat it every day. Even though it feels weird. It works. Your mind believes what it often hears. Stop feeding yourself with. I can't do it and start with I can do this, I'm going to do this. I'm ready. Visualize your dream life. Close your eyes and see it in front of you. Your dream job, the salary you want. Your own home. The love of your life. Traveling around the world. Feel it. Feel the happiness that that would give you. Now open your eyes and understand. Every major change starts in your mind. If you can think of it, you can achieve it. But just thinking is not enough. You have to act, control your mind and you control your life. Your mind is a powerful tool. If you don't control it, it will control you. Be aware of that. Think about it. How often do you have negative thoughts? Sentences like I'm not good enough, I'm going to fail. This is not for me, unconsciously holding you back. When those thoughts come, say out loud. Stopper! I choose what I think. Choose positive thoughts. Your mind is like a muscle. The more you train, the stronger it gets. Train your mind to see solutions. No problems. Train him to see opportunities. No obstacles. You are stronger than you think. Everything you need is already inside you. What is missing? Believe in yourself. Do you want a good job? You can get it. Do you want to marry the love of your life? Of course you can. Travel Building, Owning a house, Seeing the world. Making dreams come true. Yes, you can do it. The only one holding you back is you. So step aside and start moving towards your goals. Believe that your success, luck and deserves all the beauty in life. Start small. Dream big. Big dreams can seem overwhelming, but take one step at a time. Do you want to get fit? Start with 10 minutes of exercise a day. Do you want to improve your Dutch? Learn five new words a day. Do you want to save? Start with €10 per week. Those small steps may seem insignificant, but they make all the difference. Day after day, week after week, year after year. And suddenly you are much further than you thought. Be your own guy. Don't wait for others to motivate you. Don't wait until someone believes in you more than you do. Look in the mirror and say: I am proud of myself. I work hard, I grow, I can do this. You don't need permission to follow your dreams. Believe in yourself. Stand behind yourself and don't stop because of what others say. Surround yourself with people who inspire you. Listen to motivational speeches, read positive books, follow people who have already achieved what you want. Positive environment, Positive progress. Simple. Think of Thomas Edison. He failed more than a thousand times before he invented the light bulb. When people asked about his failures, he said I didn't fail. I discovered a thousand ways that didn't work. Every night, ask yourself: what did I do today to get closer to my goals, and what can I do better tomorrow? And then do it. Persistence is the key to true success. And while you're dreaming, don't forget to be grateful. Gratitude changes how you see the world. It reminds you how far you've come and gives you strength to keep going. Every morning, write down three things you're grateful for: your family, your health, or just this. You are alive and you have a new day. A new day is a new chance.
